p: The thermodynamics of RK-33 binding to DDX3X was measured by ITC ( Figure 1E,F). RK-33 bound weakly ( Figure 1E), with only low c value hyperbolic curves [ 33] obtained when using higher concentrations of RK-33 ( Figure 1F). Fitting to a one-site binding model enabled estimation of the dissociation constant ( K d) of 33 Î¼M.
